186032344.review: ИГРА НЕ ДЛЯ КАЗУАЛОВ! 8 стихий на 8 клавиш, чтобы быть эффективным в бою, приходится нажимать кнопки не глядя, из-за чего, я часто промахивался по нужной стихии. Кроме того, есть 4 варианта применения заклинания: перед собой, на себя, вокруг себя и на оружие. На то, чтобы в пылу боя разобраться как мне лучше применить созданное заклинание и не призвать горящий камень себе на голову я тоже потратил немало времени. Ну и противники, у каждого типа которых есть свои слабости, о которых они молчат, и тем самым дарят тебе удовольствие самому найти эту слабость и бессовестно воспользоваться ею. Все это - сложности, с которых я горел первые 10 часов, но преодолев которые, я понял на сколько игра хороша. Ее необычные механики колдовства позволяют тебе все время открывать для себя новые связки заклинаний, а каждая стычка с врагом на поздней стадии игры заставляет проверить свой скилл. Теперь, когда я наконец-то начал получать от игры удовольствие, я смело рекомендую ее.

185352825.review:
It's working! It's working! 
After Magicka 1, it's wonderful how perfectly good the new game is running. But I was puzzled by the changes to the gameplay. Useless shield spell, slow movement, cooldown on magicka usage even in "manual" mode. Frozen enemies are immune to laser spells. Why try to bring "balance" to the game and ruin it eventually? It seems more suitable for PvP than PvE. And then I found about Magicka Wizard Wars. And it's clear to me they just transferred multiplayer game mechanics to the single-player/co-op game and didn't bother to make it fun again.

I stopped playing with a friend after the 6th chapter, and we went back to Magicka 1 to complete challenges because it's so much more fun. The game field in Magicka 2 is too close and too zoomed in. There is little room to maneuver. And your player speed is slower than every enemy in the game. You can't teleport because of the cooldown, haste runs out too quickly, and there are damage sponge enemies everywhere. The shield is useless; it's only against laser spells, and I didn't see any mob using those spells. It's just not that fun compared to Magicka 1. I love to traverse the game field, I love to memorize ridiculous spell combos, and I like to see that chaos. Of course, Magicka 2 has its own moments. But the humor isn't there. Bosses are just regular enemies with big health bars. And for a sequel, it's a Iletdown, not an improvement. Bummer.

That in itself was irritating but doable, but unfortunately none of us could even make a Paradox Plaza account - 'Unable to connect to Paradox Servers' if attempted in-game, and infinite loading screen when attempted via Paradox's website. I suppose still playable if you're going completely solo, but the whole point of this was for a multiplayer romp, and that's currently impossible.

184752505.review:
O sistema de misturar elementos é incrivelmente divertido e quando você desenvolve a memória muscular para fazer as combinações elementais você se sente um atirador de elite. Esse jogo é um dos poucos que realmente entende como um mago deveria ser, pena que esse foi o ultimo da franquia, acho que as pessoas preferem mais matar insetos com armas de fogo do que matar goblins com cajados mágicos. As piadas são engraçadas e cada raça/facção tem um sotaque diferente (os elfos são franceses e os monges são japoneses). A única coisa que eu odiei foram as conquistas de fazer uma única coisa 1000 vezes (morrer, matar amigos e reviver)

Nota: 9/10

183865427.review: 一开始接触这个游戏是手机的魔能方碑之巫，手机游戏不适配现在市面上的大部分机型，后面来steam找了同作，整体玩法是很不错的，魔法元素的搭配以及输出的术法变式都很有意思，但是就是联机做的太差，必须要科学上网，以及2024年了，这个游戏还是没有自适配中文= =好评打给情怀。

183780300.review:
I had a lot of fun with this game, it dosen't 1-up [b] magicka 1 [/b] because the game REALLY keeps your power in check for most of the game, but at least the game is stable and has good netcode for [b] co-op [/b],unlike magicka 1 where as playing online would be a gamble on how long it would take to crash the game. So Magicka 2 definitely a plus on a game you can play.

The game is quite short too, i finished the campaign in 4 hours. Most of the end game will be doing arenas and challenges, unlocking modifiers at higher difficulties, which REALLY test your skills at this game.

Just remember to limit your fps to something like 90fps or 75fps through RTSS(Rivatunner statistics server server) or vsync if you have a monitor below 144hz. Because for some reason this game has no FPS limiter, and it eats your CPU for lunch the higher the frame rate. I have no idea why it does that, but it was a huge oversight from the devs.

Overall, if you want a good chunk of what magicka 1 used to be, and what [b] one of the best mage simulator in the market [/b] is, then play this game.

9/10 too short but sweet.
